## GAD-7 vs MLQ

Conducting a comparative study on psychological instruments like GAD-7 and MLQ can be a complex process, demanding extensive time and effort. Thankfully, there are tools like Harmony that greatly simplify this task. Harmony is a unique software application designed to assist researchers in harmonising questionnaire items, even in different languages, using advanced natural language processing and generative AI models. The comparison process on Harmony is significantly less subjective and time-consuming as compared to traditional methods. By using Harmony, researchers can get a percentage match between each item in GAD-7 and MLQ, aiding them in their GAD-7 vs MLQ comparison studies. The GAD-7 scale is designed to assess the severity of generalized anxiety disorder, while the MLQ seeks to elicit subjective assessments of one's life's meaning and purpose. These two tools approach mental health from different angles, but a comparative study between them, a GAD-7 vs MLQ, can provide insightful data. By using Harmony for the comparison, researchers can easily match the items in these two different questionnaires, thereby revealing any potential correlations between anxiety and life meaning perceptions. Do you wish to delve into a comparative study of GAD-7 vs MLQ? You needn't look any further than Harmony, a state-of-the-art tool for language model analysis and harmonisation. Whether you select instruments from Harmony's extensive database or upload your own PDFs, the process is streamlined and efficient. Harmony significantly reduces the time consuming process of manually comparing items, allowing you to focus on what truly matters - the research and the results. So, for any GAD-7 vs MLQ comparison, Harmony is the ideal companion.

## Compare the items in GAD-7 English and MLQ

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import GAD-7 and MLQ into Harmony and harmonise them</a> - find similarities between the two instruments using our AI platform
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just GAD-7 into Harmony</a> - compare GAD-7 English with other instruments
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just MLQ into Harmony</a> - compare MLQ with other instruments


## Questions in GAD-7

|   No. | GAD-7 English                                                                                                                                      |
|------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|     1 | Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge                                                                                                               |
|     2 | Not being able to stop or control worrying                                                                                                         |
|     3 | Worrying too much about different things                                                                                                           |
|     4 | Trouble relaxing                                                                                                                                   |
|     5 | Being so restless that it is hard to sit still                                                                                                     |
|     6 | Becoming easily annoyed or irritable                                                                                                               |
|     7 | Feeling afraid, as if something awful might happen                                                                                                 |
|     8 | If you checked any problems, how difficult have they made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people? |
